request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/adgroup/searchAdgroupList')
request.add_api_parameter("pageSize", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("endDate", "2023-03-08")
request.add_api_parameter("campaignId", "101100023522308")
request.add_api_parameter("pageNo", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("bizCode", "sponsoredSearch")
request.add_api_parameter("adgroupName", "-")
request.add_api_parameter("startDate", "2023-03-01")
request.add_api_parameter("onlineStatus", "1")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/adgroup/searchAdgroupList')
request.add_api_param('pageSize', '10')
request.add_api_param('endDate', '2023-03-08')
request.add_api_param('campaignId', '101100023522308')
request.add_api_param('pageNo', '1')
request.add_api_param('bizCode', 'sponsoredSearch')
request.add_api_param('adgroupName', '-')
request.add_api_param('startDate', '2023-03-01')
request.add_api_param('onlineStatus', '1')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
